item.title: Shveta add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler; solitude will not be solitude, poverty will not be poverty, nor weakness weakness." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shveta add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "The cost of a thing is the amount of what I will call life which is required to be exchanged for it, immediately or in the long run." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shveta add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description:
"It is not enough to be industrious; so are the ants. What are you industrious about?"
[<i>Letter to Harrison Blake</i>; November 16, 1857]" -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shveta add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything - anger, anxiety, or possessions - we cannot be free." -- Thich Nhat Hanh
